FacilityStr1: North of Shobonier & West of US 51
FRS_Method: GPS CARRIER PHASE STATIC RELATIVE POSITION

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
1. The Facility Policy
        A. To maintain equipment in optimum condition to assure safety for employees, area residents, and  
             surrounding eviroment.
        B.  All personal will be well trained in procedures for handling product safely.
        C. Safety equipment, and contact people and agencies available and posted at all times.
2. Facility Information
        Facility Known as: Belpark Ltd.      Custom Farm Service
        Located at:             RR 1 Box 15,  Shobonier, IL. 62885
                                     (1 mile North of Shobonier, 1/8 mile east of US Rt. 51)
                                      Facility Phone (618) 846 2201
                                      Owner/Manager - Jon Phillips (618) 425 3476
3. The Worst-Case Release Scenario
         Notify Manager, Fire Department, and all people in the 1.16 mile vicinity in the event of a magor 
        release of product. Implement containment with water mists from nearby hydrants, if proper 
        safety equipment are used and conditions are safe to do so.
   (Note: facility is in a predomantly rural area. Distance to nearest residence 1000'. Only 4 homes  
                  with in a quarter of a mile. And there are trees and buidings surrouding the plant that 
                  would significantly alter drift from an accidental release.)   
4. The Accident Release Program at Facility
        Yes, written accident release program and employees trained for response.
5. The Five-Year Accident History
        There have been "NO" accidents at this facility. 
6. The Emergency Response Program
         1. Notification of Fire Department, Emergency Desaster agency ( if a major release), Manager and       
               and all individuals who may lay in path of the released product.
         2. Review safety procedures and containment procedures before attempting containment.
7. Planned Changes to Improve Safety   
         1. Improve and Enhance Safety training for employees.
2. Present Safety information to area reponse agencies to better advice them.
